long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of manually opening the same websites everyday?

TABITY is a productivity extension built to solve the process of manually opening the same websites each day. We provide a simple shortcut command to open Work tabs and Play tabs.

No need to navigate and open each website manually. Reduce all your clicks down to a simple shortcut. 

TABITY will increase your productivity and help you start quicker.
